Title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
FullTitle: The Last Stop in Yuma County
SortTitle: Last Stop in Yuma County, The
Plot: While awaiting the next fuel truck at a middle-of-nowhere Arizona rest stop, a traveling young knife salesman is thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two similarly stranded bank robbers with no qualms about using cruelty—or cold, hard steel—to protect their bloodstained, ill-gotten fortune.
Tagline: Never bring a knife salesman to a gunfight.
